page.title: 13CLOSING CARDOWAN COLLIERY
page.content: This is an interview with Mr. Paul Baker, a former miner at Cardowan Colliery. { {Q. How long did you work in Cardowan? A. I worked at Cardowan for about 9 years. {Q. What was your job? A. I was a banksman. This means I was in charge of the cage which took the men up and down the shaft. {Q. When and why did Cardowan close ? A. It closed in 1983 because of geological faults. {Q. What has happened to the pit since {it closed ? A. The pit shaft has been filled in and all the buildings removed from the surface.
